CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound copper
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding copper clouds the mind. Names slip away, memories blur, and focus shatters â€” but each lost moment is etched into the metalmind. With time, the Allomancer can recall every lesson, every detail, with perfect clarity and terrifying speed.
